body.name: Cordless Electric Mop for Floor Cleaning, AlfaBot WS-24 Electric Spin Mop, Electric Mop with Water Sprayer and LED Headlight, Lightweight & Rechargeable Floor Scrubber for Hardwood Tile Floors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 58 mins
features: DOUBLE SPIN HEAD - AlfaBot WS-24 cordless mop equipped with the dual-motor, spinning up 150r/min, which will automatically push the mop head forward so you can remove stubborn stains, dirt on home and kitchen floor more quickly, also can handle by child and elders easily.

CORDLESS USE - Modular battery design with fast charging. Cordless mop contained with 2000mAh 30W Lithium rechargeable battery, which can supports at least 40-50 minutes of mopping, easily clean up to 2000 sq.ft area after 4 hours charging.

WATER SPRAY AND LED HEADLIGHT - AlfaBot cordless spin mop with fashion design appearance. Built-in 180ml water tank for dirty floor sprink and wet cheaning. The LED light can show you the way in the night, dark corner and under bed, easily clean under furniture.

ADJUSTABLE LENGHT AND ANGLE - The height of hardwood floor mop can be adjusted 37.4‘’ to 48.4‘’ which allows anyone to comfortably use the electric mop with ease, NO bending, NO backache. It can swing 180° from left to right and 90° from front to back. It is perfect for getting into or under hard to reach spaces.

LIGHTWEIGHT & SIMPLE- This cordless mop is really lightweight and moves on its own, you just guide it, no pushing. Children and the elderly, and even pregnant women can easily use it. This's a double-win gift for those kids who are obsessed with cleaning and want to help clean up.

FOR VARIOUS FLOOR CLEANNING - This electric floor mop suitable for various floors, such as hardfloor, wooden floor, marble floor and ceramic tile floor, bathroom, can easily remove footprints, pet hairs, sebum stains, dust and invisible bacteria. By developing a cleaning habit, you can keep your home clean and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Other 3 Electric Mops Broke...I'm Going To Have This Mop for a LONG Time!
reviews.reviewText: This is my 4th electric mop in close to 4 years time. Its also the first time I've ever purchased/used an AlfaBot mop. The 3 previous mops I owned all started out fantastic at first. One lasted a year and a half, one lasted 6 months, the other lasted nearly a year. All 3 broke the same way. The piece that connects the pole to the bottom of the mop was small and plastic and broke in all 3 mops. After the 3rd mop broke, I wasn't sure if I should get another. I looked at various electric mops for sale here on Amazon and decided to go with this mop thanks to the reasonable price as well as the helpful reviews left by other customers.Assembly is simple. Took me less than 5 minutes. It did not come charged so I had to charge it prior to use. (That's not a complaint...wasn't a big deal to me that I first had to charge it) Once it was charged I was excited to test it out. (I'm a clean-freak...I LOVE to clean-that's why I was excited to try it out! Weird, I know...lol) The mop is smaller than my previous 3 and works just as well. The little piece that broke my other 3 is bigger and FAR more sturdy than the others. The mop is lightweight, glides across floors with ease and is easy to steer. Thanks to its smaller size and ability to swing 180/90 degrees it does a fantastic job of cleaning 'hard to reach' areas. (The LED light also is a factor in getting 'hard to reach' areas -its very helpful) The mop does make a noise while in use but its not loud at all)4 pads, a charging cord/adapter /measuring cup and an ION battery are all includedI'm loving this mop! Easy to use, well made, works great and is very reasonably priced. I have a good feeling about this mop! I think its going to clean my floors for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light weight
reviews.reviewText: I loved how easy it was to assemble this mop. I was able to clean a majority of my house before I had to charge it for the first time. I usually use Bona hardwood floor cleaner along with this mop and my floors feel really clean underneath my feet. The pads hold up really well in the washing machine. I also appreciate that my lower back isn’t sore when I clean. I have had this mop for several months and it is still doing really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Electric Mop Delivers Spotless Results!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Electric Mop, and it has completely transformed my cleaning routine. As someone who values efficiency and effectiveness, this innovative device has exceeded my expectations and made my cleaning tasks a breeze. Here's why I highly recommend the Electric Mop to anyone looking to simplify their cleaning process:First and foremost, the Electric Mop's performance is outstanding. With its powerful motor and advanced cleaning technology, it effortlessly tackles dirt, grime, and even stubborn stains on various surfaces. From hardwood floors to tiles and laminates, this versatile mop delivers spotless results every time. I was truly amazed at how easily it glided across different flooring types, ensuring a thorough and consistent clean.One of the standout features of the Electric Mop is its cordless design. No more tangled cords or limitations in movement! This mop's rechargeable battery provides ample power for extended cleaning sessions, allowing me to maneuver effortlessly around furniture and hard-to-reach corners. The freedom of movement it offers is truly liberating and enhances the overall cleaning experience.The Electric Mop's user-friendly design is another aspect that deserves praise. It comes with adjustable settings and intuitive controls, making it easy for anyone to operate. The lightweight construction ensures comfortable handling, minimizing fatigue during extended cleaning sessions. Additionally, the mop's swivel head effortlessly maneuvers around obstacles, ensuring efficient cleaning without strain or discomfort.Maintenance is a breeze with this electric mop. The washable and reusable mop pads are not only eco-friendly but also highly effective at trapping dirt and dust. The removable water tank is convenient for refilling and emptying, ensuring a hassle-free cleaning experience. Plus, the mop pads and accessories are readily available, making it easy to keep the Electric Mop in top condition.I also appreciate the Electric Mop's sleek and compact design, which makes storage a breeze. Its slim profile allows it to fit into tight spaces, and the collapsible handle further enhances its space-saving capabilities. The quality construction and durable materials give me confidence that this mop will last for years to come.Lastly, I must mention the exceptional customer service provided by the company. They promptly addressed all my queries and concerns, ensuring that I had a smooth and satisfying experience from start to finish. Their commitment to customer satisfaction speaks volumes about the brand's dedication to delivering a superior product.In conclusion, the Electric Mop has revolutionized my cleaning routine. Its exceptional performance, cordless convenience, user-friendly design, and easy maintenance make it a must-have for any household. Say goodbye to the hassle of traditional mops and embrace the future of cleaning with the Electric Mop. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The mop is light weight and is easy to use. The mop has a nice spray and does a great job of cleaning. Easy to maneuver around the house making the job fast and easy. I don't need to bend over because the handle is the correct height for mopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but water is only meant for 1 room.
reviews.reviewText: Super minimalistic , light weight and gets the job done ! It comes with 2 sets of pads and are washer and dryer safe. I also think it is listed at a really great price. However the about of water it holds could be a little better but for a smaller home it is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use, cleans well
reviews.reviewText: Great price point, easy to use, cleans very well, easy to clean, quick charge, long battery life. All around a great electric mop. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This cordless mop is good for cleaning daily spills and messes. it will not replace your mop and bucket. It will not deep clean for you. I originally brought this mop because I have a bad back. However, I feel as though I should have waited and save money to get a more better cleaner. This electric mop does not steam. It does not have that function. So if you're looking for something that will assist with a deep clean, this is not the product. This product is solely for daily message and spells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's good enough
reviews.reviewText: I have no carpet at home. So, this product becomes way easier to use. The water container holds enough liquid for a full cleaning. However, it is not as fast as using a regular mop. I would expect it to slide a little faster. But still, it is easy to clean. It holds the charge for a long time.

This electric mop is very handy for wet cleaning of hardwood floors. Any available cleaning solution can be used. The solution spray has perfect volume and spread area, Using the second set of pads and another type of solution (any available) this mop washes all types of tiles. One charge of batteries is more than enough to clean two rooms, kitchen, and corridor. I used this mop for wet cleaning stairs and bathroom walls covered with tiles.

reviews.reviewTitle: ESTOY FELIZ TRAPEANDO CON ALFABOT WS-24
reviews.reviewText: ESTE TRAPEADOR ERA LO QUE HABIA SOÑADO.
Hält was es verspricht. Einfache wassersparende Bodenreinigung. Ob Fliesen im Bad oder Laminat im Wohnzimmer. Super Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. Absolut zufrieden.
Utilisation facile un petit problème il mais longtemps a chargé

reviews.reviewTitle: Más que una mopa, como esperaba
reviews.reviewText: Es una mopa y no una fregona: si mantienes "actualizada" la limpieza, funciona estupendamente.El modo húmedo es de los mejores que probé: poniendo algún producto consigues quitar la mayoría de manchas. Hay un par de mapas que tienen algo más de fuerza sin dañar el suelo.En mi caso lo uso para madera natural, no había leído opiniones al respecto y probé y estoy encantada. Yo no veo cercos ni nada de eso que dicen. Pongo incluso la cera . Las mapas se retiran para cambiarlas o lavarlas perfectamente. Las meto a la lavadora son de buena calidad, no pierden un pelo, salen perfectas. El sistema de velero también funciona correctamente no se mueven.La luz es un extra añadido especialmente al limpiar zonas de más difícil acceso.La mopa es muy ligera se flexiona en cualquier dirección y se endereza muy fácilmente y es súper estable. También se recoge y guarda muy discretamente por ello. Quizás por ello el depósito no puede ser más grande pero es suficiente.La batería a mi me parece que dur mucho, incluso para más de 2 usos alguna vez. A veces presión para insistir en alguna zona y ni se para ni pierde fuerza, estoy encantada.Tarda unas horas en cargar, diría que unas 4. Antes de descargar se pone un rojo intermitente que aún permite un breve tiempo de uso.LA RECOMIENDO TOTALMENTE
